1138.quoteText:
We also automatically collect device-specific information when you install, access, or use our Services.
This information can include information such as the hardware model, operating system information, app version, app usage and debugging information, browser information, IP address, and device identifiers
1138.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: "We may also collect information about your use of the Services [...], including your IP address, browser information (including referrers), device information (such as [...])"

6742.quoteText:
Privacy Policy Changes

We may amend or update this policy from time to time. If we believe that the changes are material, we’ll let you know by doing one (or more) of the following: (i) posting the changes on or through the Services, (ii) sending you an email or message about the changes, or (iii) posting an update in the version notes on the Apps’ platform. We encourage you to check back regularly and review any updates.
6742.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

6744.quoteText:
By posting Your Content through our Services, you grant Etsy a license to use it.
We don’t claim any ownership to Your Content, but we have your permission to use it to help Etsy function and grow.
6744.title: You maintain ownership of your data

tosdr.case: You maintain ownership of your data

7693.quoteText: You agree not to assert any moral rights or rights of publicity against us for using Your Content.
7693.title: You sign away moral rights

7694.quoteText: If you reject or block all cookies in your browser settings, you will not be able to take advantage of Etsy's Services as some cookies are necessary for the Site to function properly.
7694.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

7695.quoteText:
These technologies allow a partner to recognize your computer, mobile device or network device (like an IoT device such as a voice-activated assistant or smart TV), each time you visit Etsy or other websites and mobile applications based on data like a cookie, your IP address, or device ID, but do not allow access to other personal information from Etsy.
However, these technologies may allow us or a third party to recognize you, either from a single device or across devices, over time.
7695.title: Your profile is combined across various products

tosdr.case: Your profile is combined across various products
